author: Reuters Editorial
title: BRIEF-Kelt Reports Q4 Adjusted FFO Per Share C$0.18
text:
March 7 (Reuters) - Kelt Exploration Ltd:
* KELT REPORTS FINANCIAL AND OPERATING RESULTS FOR THE QUARTER AND YEAR ENDED DECEMBER 31, 2017
* QTRLY AVERAGE PRODUCTION WAS 25,063 BOE PER DAY, UP 27% * FORECASTED AVERAGE PRODUCTION IN 2018 IS ESTIMATED TO BE IN RANGE FROM 28,500 BOE PER DAY TO 29,500 BOE PER DAY
* 2018 CAPITAL EXP‍​ENDITURE GUIDANCE UNCHANGED * WILL RE-EVALUATE ITS SPENDING PLANS FOR REMAINDER OF 2018 AFTER Q1 Source text for Eikon: Further company coverage:
